opponent.label: Aqua
opponent.from: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World!
opponent.description: The goddess of water worshipped by the Axis Order. She used to guide humans to the afterlife, but after being unwillingly brought down to a fantasy world, she became an adventuring Arch Priest. Although kind-hearted, cheerful, and carefree at times, she is also well-known for being an immature and whiny crybaby.
